production.country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)

director.name: Dave Mclean
director.nationality: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)

synopsis.native: His football career over, Davie starts promoting gigs in Dundee with two friends, leading to a hugely ambitious Iron Maiden show. Out of his depth and in debt with gangster Fergie, Davie needs to pull off the biggest scheme of his life.
